SELECT * FROM (SELECT NOTIFY_NO, NOTIFY_TYPE_NO, NOTIFY_CONTENT, NOTIFY_STATUS, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(NOTIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN TO_CHAR(NOTIFY_DATE, 'AM HH" : "MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(NOTIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END NOTIFY_DATE, (SELECT NOTIFY_TITLE FROM NOTIFY_TYPE ALAT WHERE ALAT.NOTIFY_TYPE_NO = ALA.NOTIFY_TYPE_NO) AS NOTIFY_TITLE FROM NOTIFY ALA WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND NOTIFY_STATUS != -1 ORDER BY NOTIFY_NO DESC)
WHERE ROWNUM < 7
